name: laces
actor_no_arg: You search everyone's feet in the room, looking for someone with laces.
others_no_arg: $n looks around the room, staring at everyone's feet.
actor_found_target: With the greatest of stealth, you tie $S shoelaces together.
others_found: $n sneaks up to $N and ties $S shoelaces together.
target_found: You try to take a step, and you hit the world facedown!  Someone must have tied your shoelaces together!
others_auto: $n cleverly ties $s own shoelaces together, tries to walk, and sprawls flat on the floor.
